overview: The fourth in a four-part video art series produced by duo Christiane Dellbr√ºgge and Ralf de Moll in the early-'90s, this piece continues the series' themes of incorporating art theory into video art, particularly through the juxtaposition of words and images. Here, text exploring the intersections and conflicts between electronic media and the creation/reception of new media art is dissected into individual words that are then pair with split-second images and sound clips, typed across the montage until it fills the screen.
title: Video Theory 4
